section.p: Latitude of the unit when dispatched

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11541 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.151"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11284)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69750-8" EMS unit GPS latitude Vehicle --at dispatch (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10620)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10621)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.17 UCUM units SHOULD be "deg". This may require conversion from a parsed "degree + minutes" representation to a decimal representation.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11284)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69750-8" EMS unit GPS latitude Vehicle --at dispatch (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10620)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10621)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.17 UCUM units SHOULD be "deg". This may require conversion from a parsed "degree + minutes" representation to a decimal representation.

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.151" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="69750-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS unit GPS latitude Vehicle --at dispatch"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation>
